Bash(python3 -c "
import json

# Read the notebook
with open(''/Users/devon7y/VS Code/LLM Factor Analysis/qwen3_factor_analysis.ipynb'', ''r'') as f:
    notebook = json.load(f)

# Find and modify the cell containing the np.load line
for cell in notebook[''cells'']:
    if cell[''cell_type''] == ''code'' and ''source'' in cell:
        # Check if this cell contains the line we want to modify
        source_lines = cell[''source'']
        for i, line in enumerate(source_lines):
            if ''data = np.load(pregenerated_path)'' in line and ''allow_pickle'' not in line:
                # Replace the line
                source_lines[i] = line.replace(''np.load(pregenerated_path)'', ''np.load(pregenerated_path, allow_pickle=True)'')
                print(f''Fixed line {i} in cell'')
                break

# Write the modified notebook back
with open(''/Users/devon7y/VS Code/LLM Factor Analysis/qwen3_factor_analysis.ipynb'', ''w'') as f:
    json.dump(notebook, f, indent=1)

print(''Successfully updated the notebook!'')
")
